Corona diaries

Welcome to my Blog!

I am sure you are all well aware of the pandemic, that is Corona Virus, the world has completely changed.

This blog tries to make sense of this new time.

In this blog you will find some helpful tips on how to navigate through the weird time finding the wonderful parts bound up through all the sh*t!

This image pretty much sums up the extent to which we are allowed to socialise in this new reality we are living in. Only with members of your household and 1.5m away. Although of course it is optimal to not even leave your house.

Will a democracy ever be able to truely enforce this?
